src:
Data dan Fakta Serie A: AS Roma vs Napoli
01 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 4 AS Roma akan menjamu peringkat 6 Napoli pada pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Stadio Olimpico ini.
Dalam laga kandangnya melawan Napoli di Serie A musim lalu, Roma takluk 1-4. Tertinggal oleh gol Arkadiusz Milik menit 2, Roma menyamakan kedudukan lewat penalti Diego Perotti menit 45, tapi kemudian kebobolan lagi oleh Dries Mertens menit 49, Simone Verdi menit 54, dan Amin Younes menit 81.
Roma selalu kalah dalam 3 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Napoli di Serie A, yakni 1-2 musim 2016/17, 0-1 musim 2017/18, dan 1-4 musim 2018/19.
Roma cuma menang 1 kali dalam 5 laga terakhirnya melawan Napoli di Serie A, kandang dan tandang (M1 S1 K3).
Roma tak pernah mencetak lebih dari 1 gol dalam 5 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Napoli di Serie A.
Roma selalu gagal clean sheet dalam 6 laga terakhirnya melawan Napoli di Serie A.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Serie A Data and Facts: AS Roma vs Napoli
Nov 01 2019, 15:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - 4th place AS Roma will host Napoli 6th in Week 11 of Serie A 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at the Stadio Olimpico.
In his home game against Napoli in Serie A last season, Roma defeated 1-4. Left behind by Arkadiusz's goal in the 2nd minute, Roma equalized through Diego Perotti's penalty in the 45th minute, but then conceded again by Dries Mertens in the 49th minute, Simone Verdi 54th minute, and Amin Younes the 81st minute.
Roma have always lost in their last 3 home matches against Napoli in Serie A, namely 1-2 2016/17 season, 0-1 2017/18 season, and 1-4 2018/19 season.
Roma have only won 1 of their last 5 matches against Napoli in Serie A, home and away (M1 S1 K3).
Roma have never scored more than 1 goal in their last 5 home matches against Napoli in Serie A.
Roma have always failed clean sheets in their last 6 matches against Napoli in Serie A.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
